content: watch the free video tutorial for this project 1 the body of this cardigan is knit flat in one piece from the bottom up the back panel is worked first without casting off the first front panel is worked the second front panel is worked after stitches for the sleeves are picked up from the outer edge of the garment and worked in the round to the cuff stitches for the neckband are picked up from the inner edge of the garment and worked flat my first cardigan pattern level intermediate sizes xs s/m m/l l/xl 2x 3x materials 4 5 6 7 8 9 balls of loopy mango merino no 5 yarn 74 yds 68 m | 150 g 5 3 oz each 100% merino wool size us 19 15 mm circular needles 32 80 cm in length note for sleeves you will need to use magic loop method when using size us 19 15 mm circular needles 32 80 cm to avoid magic loop for sleeves you can use an additional size us 19 15 mm circular 20 50 cm needles gauge garter stitch on size us 19 15 mm needles 6 5 sts & 13 row/4 10 cm 1x1 rib on size us 19 15 mm needles 7 sts & 8 row/4 10 cm finished measurements xs width 16 40 cm length 13 33 cm s/m width 20 50 cm length 14 35 cm m/l width 21 53 cm length 16 40 cm l/xl width 23 5 59 5 cm length 17 43 cm 2x width 26 66 cm length 17 5 44 cm 3x width 28 5 72 cm length 18 45 cm 1 https //loopymango com/pages/my-first-cardigan-full-project 1 1 https //loopymango com/pages/my-first-cardigan-full-project
